description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. The sun is shining and the birds are singing. Today seems like the perfect day to declare your love for Angry Girl. What could possibly go wrong on a day like today?   Each level consists of scrambling over obstacles to escape your pursuer who for varying reasons is not particularly fond of you. Can you reach the house of Angry Girl unscathed?
